author: Amy Gunia / Hong Kong
title: Why Hong Kong Is Extending Coronavirus Restrictions – Even as New Cases Dwindle to Zero
description: Hong Kong's conservative approach is in sharp contrast to the U.S., where some leaders are pushing to lift restrictions and reopen the economy as quickly as possible
content: Hong Kong achieved a remarkable milestone on Monday—zero new cases of coronavirus. It’s a sign that the latest social distancing measures, set to expire this week, helped to end the spike in infections the city saw in late March and early April as residents, … [+3990 chars]
